title: Re: PayPal
content:
Luckily I haven't had the need to..3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: PayPal
content:
Depends on if you have a site where you can add a 'Donate' button. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

I don't use it. I almost never buy anything over the internet, and when I do, I try to do it per bank account. Not PayPal.___________________
DaVince, Yet Another Amateur Game Creator! :P
